text: [Chapter 26a] [Sector 5, Shadow Realm Research Center]

speaker: left
text: Proton...

speaker: left
text: I've heard much about you, and you've caused us a lot of trouble...

speaker: left
text: I don't understand though, why would you return here after all of these years?

speaker: left
text: We can't let you have the Holy Itucher, you'll surely destroy the world as we know it.

speaker: left
text: And this is revenge for what you've done to Specians and the Xuirs.

speaker: right
text: What I've done to the Xuirs?

speaker: right
text: The only thing I've done for the Xuirs is help them.

speaker: left
text: What do you mean?

speaker: right
text: The Proto-Xuirs are a pained existence, an incomplete and failed life form.

speaker: right
text: The Proto-Xuirs will only be free once a complete Xuir is created, the lifeform that they were meant to be!

speaker: left
text: Being incomplete doensn't devalue your existence. This is just an excuse to justify your actions.

speaker: right
text: It doesn't? Well, take a look at this...

speaker: right
text: What do you think of this, Proton?

speaker: left
text: You're... a Proto-Xuir?

speaker: right
text: Why do you think I've dedicated myself to the Xuir Research?

speaker: right
text: I am an incomplete creation of the past researchers, an existence of failure.

speaker: right
text: This existence is pain. Proton, surely you've considered the fact that you were the result of unsuccessful experiements, that your very existence is a literal embodiment of failure.

speaker: right
text: I wish to fix this failure, no matter the cost.

speaker: right
text: I will create the being that were supposed to be, the one that we could've been...

speaker: right
text: And only then, will be free from our burden of an failed existence and be able to die in the peace of knowing that our failure had been fixed.

speaker: right
text: We must fix our existence, Proton.

speaker: right
text: Sadly, it seems you do not understand.

speaker: right
text: Like the others, all who oppose me must be defeated in the sake of mending our existence.

speaker: right
text: Why... why.. must this happen...

speaker: right
text: The Xuir... must be... completed...

speaker: left
text: Everyone, search the area.

speaker: left
text: The Holy Itucher should be somewhere around here.
